item.description: This authentic Ethiopian and Eritrean restaurant serves its platters up family style, so dining here often becomes a communal experience. If you are in an adventurous mood, Abyssinian is a good choice for something hot and spicy and a little left of the norm. The creamy yellow walls, the East African textiles on display behind the bar, and the chilled-out Afro-pop on the stereo set the scene. The outdoor patio is good for people watching when the weather's nice.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Abyssinian Ethiopian Restaurant - Hartford
